metadata.dcterms:title: University of Alberta Libraries Ithaka Survey - Survey Data
metadata.dcterms:creator: University of Alberta Libraries
metadata.dcterms:description: This set contains survey data from the Ithaka survey that was launched on December 22, 2014, and was closed to new responses on January 31, 2015. The data contains a total of 551 complete responses. The questionnaire addressed: how faculty members discover materials for research; their data preservation and management behaviors and needs; their digital research activities and methodologies; faculty members’ use of varying types of formats; their practices and attitudes regarding undergraduate students’ research skills; and the role of the library in supporting faculty members’ needs.
